game.name: DCS: Mosquito FB VI Freeman's Folly Campaign by SUNTS Simulations
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: A story based campaign with two fictitious protagonists F/Lt Dougie Maxwell (RAAF), a former Blemhiem Mk.1 (F) pilot and F/Sgt Ginger Fenwick is your Geordie navigator from Cramlington in the North East of England.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A story based campaign with two fictitious protagonists F/Lt Dougie Maxwell (RAAF), a former Blemhiem Mk.1 (F) pilot and F/Sgt Ginger Fenwick is your Geordie navigator from Cramlington in the North East of England.
